mapper.select: SELECT SSN.TCHR_NO tchrNo, SSN.SLR slr, TCHR.ID id, USR.NM nm FROM TB_TCHRASSN SSN, TB_CLSS CLS, TB_TCHR TCHR, TB_USR USR WHERE SSN.CLSS_ID = CLS.CLSS_ID AND TCHR.TCHR_NO = SSN.TCHR_NO AND USR.ID = TCHR.ID AND END_DT > SYSDATE AND SSN.SLR IS NOT NULL
SELECT TCHR.TCHR_NO tchrNo, TCHR.ID id, SLR slr, NM nm FROM TB_TCHR TCHR, TB_USR USR WHERE SLR IS NOT NULL and TCHR.ID = USR.ID

SELECT YEAR year, MONTH month, DAY day, COST_ITEM costItem, NO no, AMOUNT amount FROM TB_SALE WHERE (YEAR >= #{year1} AND MONTH >=#{month1} AND DAY>=#{day1}) AND (YEAR <= #{year2} AND MONTH <=#{month2} AND DAY<=#{day2})
